reason: Initialize the hand to ensure fingers are in the default open posture before starting the manipulation task.
Move to the blue_cube first, as it is positioned close to the target mug and may block grasping if not cleared.
Push the blue_cube to the right to clear it from the target mug area.
Reset the hand posture after the push operation to prepare for the next action.
Move back to the blue_cube as it may still be partially obstructing the target area.
Lower the arm to the working height to prepare for pushing the blue_cube further away.
Push the blue_cube further right to ensure it is completely out of the grasping path.
Lift the arm to a safe height after clearing the blue_cube, preparing to approach the target for grasping.
Reset the hand to the default open posture to ensure proper finger configuration before grasping the mug.
The blue_cube has been cleared from the workspace. Attempt to grasp the target mug now.
Lift the arm to check if the mug was successfully grasped.
The previous grasp may not have been successful. Retry grasping the target mug.
Reset the hand after encountering a stuck state to prepare for another grasp attempt.
Make another grasp attempt on the target mug after resetting the hand posture.
Lift the arm to confirm the mug has been successfully picked up.
The target (mug) has been successfully grasped. The task is complete.
